Reviews.Title: This phone is junk
Reviews.Author: DC777
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my mom. It's a nice little uncomplicated phone. It worked well for about 5 months. After that she started noticing the phone was dead when she went to use it. The battery is fine. Turns out that with the skin on, the phone display was not turning off. Even with the skin off, the phone display would turn on in her purse and drain the battery. I suspect the lid pin wore down a bit and is not pushing the lid switch in far enough.I sent it back for repair. They did a page full of diagnostics, updated the software, and sent it back. Despite me identifying the lid switch as the issue, they did nothing to address the problem. I called customer service back and had to listen to the idiot on the other end of the line spend an hour telling me how a lid switch worked. She said I could send it back again, but if the technician found nothing wrong, I would need to pay $15 to get my phone back.Since I already spent $15 sending the phone in the first time, I told her I was not going to take another chance at dropping another $15 on this piece of junk. A rubber band will work for now. I'll replace it with a more reliable product from a different company in 10 months when I update my contract. At least I now have the knowledge to know Sanyo/Kyocera makes junk.

Reviews.Title: Sanyo Vero Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Ms. "B"
Reviews.Content: Ordered phone on Friday night - showed it was shipped on Sat and it arrived on Monday.  Took phone to Sprint store and it was put on machine and diagnosed to be in perfect condition.  Downloaded info from old phone (dropped in pool) to new one and new phone is working just fine.  Phone was in great like new condition as described.  Would recommend this seller / would use again if occasion arises.  And I love Amazon for making it so easy and secure, knowing if phone was defective, my money would be credited back to my card.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use!
Reviews.Author: S. mojaddidi
Reviews.Content: The best simple phone in my opinion. Ordered it for my mom. She likes it. The numbers show big on the screen and the speakerphone is loud. Over all great product!

Reviews.Title: Went bad after two months.
Reviews.Author: Craig Pearman
Reviews.Content: I bought this device in September 2011, and two months later the ear piece went bad. All my callers sounded distorted and buzzy. Because I didn't get wire insurance, I had to send it back to the factory in NY (since it had a one-year manufacturer's warranty). They repaired it, but two months later, the ear piece went bad again. So I sent it back again, they repaired it again, and once again the ear piece failed within two months.Despite my pleas with Sprint customer service as well as the Sprint store that sold me this phone, they refused to exchange it. I've been a Sprint customer for over ten years, and this is the way I'm treated. But the phone is a piece of crap regardless of who the provider is. Not recommended at all.

Reviews.Title: good deal
Reviews.Author: taco
Reviews.Content: Needed a cell to replace a broken cell that was under contract. This phone is a basic cell that looks good and works great for someone that only needs it to talk. The price was great compared to cellular store prices w/o contract

Reviews.Title: Sanyo Vero by Kyocera, Model SCP 3820 for Sprint
Reviews.Author: JOJO
Reviews.Content: It was exactly what I wanted. Four teen more words are required so I am writing these words now. okay?

Reviews.Title: Very happy
Reviews.Author: Itsdadish
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my grandparents because the numbers are large and the phone is easy to use. I received this phone in better condition than I expected and the packaging was not damaged. received it when expected.

Reviews.Title: Great Simple Phone
Reviews.Author: Happy Homeowner
Reviews.Content: This was an exact replacement for a phone I accidentally destroyed.  The price was a quarter of the price the Sprint Store wanted for a similar phone.  I didn't want a smart phone.  All I wanted was to receive and make calls.  This phone does that! There was no learning curve. My only regret is that my contact info could not be transferred due to the condition of my old phone.  The new phone even came with a carrying case for my belt.

Reviews.Title: Recieved more than ever expected!
Reviews.Author: Arysta Argabright
Reviews.Content: It is a pleasant surprise to have received this, let alone any package ordered online, and be completely satisfied. It said fair condition- meaning heavy wear from normal use- and I would have to say it was much better than fair! Barely any blemish on the screen, no physical damage or wear on housing of phone. Battery cover was not broken or worn at all and battery holds a long charge as desired. I am completely satisfied with this purchase and seller and would recommend to everyone.Thanks,your happy customer!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Cellular Dealer
Reviews.Content: Bought this item as a spare phone, end up using this a lot. This is a traditional phone with the old battery life & clarity. If you are one of those traditionalist, hating the new updated touch screen phones, you'll love this phone!

Reviews.Title: NOT SO HOT !
Reviews.Author: john c. carter
Reviews.Content: first off, the speaker is lousy, the reception is garbled & hard to understand due to the poor quality speakers.  Next there is too much navigation with this phone, you have to click for everything, even when you hang up, you have to push "end" for the call to end.  My old samsung was much better, as you might expect they don't make that model anymore.

Reviews.Title: Not a bad phone But
Reviews.Author: Meijer Goldstein
Reviews.Content: for some stupid reason, you cannot use a cable to get the pics off of the camera, so all of my pics are useless. That is stupid but the phone seems to work ok and it holds up well. It has a head phone jack and works well with bluetooth headsets. It also has voice commands that work except nobody seems to know what the command set is, not even Sanyo. Its not a bad phone for basic use.

Reviews.Title: Lost Phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: My husband lost a phone exactly like this, and had to purchase a new one.  It is a very good basic phone and he is the "no frills" kind of guy.  It was less expensive to purchase from Amazon than to get a new one through our carrier as we did not have replacement insurance at that time.  Worked out very well for us.
